resources.string:
Click the connect button to connect websocket. 
 


 Click the Start button to play speech-to-text with Next-gen Kaldi. 
 


 The source code and pre-trained models are publicly available. Please see https://github.com/k2-fsa/sherpa-onnx for details.
please input uri first,format as follows:\n ws://ip:port or wss://ip:port
